EmailTemplate.subject: Apocalypse Postponed - an ABSOLUT art bar installation by Nadim Abbas
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
As part of the ABSOLUT global collaboration with artBasel we have again invited a hugely talented Hong Kong artist to create a full immersion experience known as the Absolut art bar installation.
Nadim Abbas hosts Apocalypse Postponed, a pop up, from today to Sunday, 5 pm to 2am, in Causeway Bay at the new Soundwill Plaza 2.
Come and visit, changing performances daily.
Hope to see you,
Valeria
